response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price. My proposal is to extend the offer to you at $950,000. This is an exclusive chance to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 950000}
